description: This Dart source file defines the MockRepository class, which provides in-memory mock data and utility methods for a spiritual calendar app, including festivals, vrats, mantras, quiz questions, and user state.

classes.name: MockRepository
classes.description: Singleton class providing mock data and state management for the app, including festivals, vrats, mantras, quiz questions, and user progress indicators.

methods.name: todayTithi
methods.description: Returns mock tithi information for today.

methods.name: festivalsForMonth
methods.description: Returns a list of mock festivals occurring in the specified month.

methods.name: allVrats
methods.description: Provides a list of all available vrats.

methods.name: selectedVrats
methods.description: Returns the set of currently selected vrats.

methods.name: addVrat
methods.description: Adds a vrut to the selected vrats set.

methods.name: removeVrat
methods.description: Removes a vrut from the selected vrats set.

methods.name: mantras
methods.description: Returns a list of predefined mantras.

methods.name: dailyQuiz
methods.description: Provides a list of mock daily quiz questions.

methods.name: japaCount
methods.description: Returns the current mock count of Japa repetitions.

methods.name: resetJapa
methods.description: Resets the Japa count to zero.

methods.name: quizStreak
methods.description: Returns the current mock quiz streak.

methods.name: resetQuizStreak
methods.description: Resets the quiz streak to zero.
